Bag of Holding.summary: A bag whose inside is much larger than its outside. Holds up to 500 lb (64 cubic feet). Retrieving an item typically takes an action. If overloaded or torn, itâ€™s destroyed and spills contents into the Astral Plane.

Cloak of Protection.summary: While wearing this cloak, you gain +1 bonus to AC and +1 bonus to saving throws.
